resources.string: Get new experience in using sign language, its Free !!
This sample needs camera and storage permission.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
This sample demonstrates the basic use of Camera2 API. Check the source code to see how you can display camera preview and take pictures.
Lets go to our core feature, the translator. You can use the feature by click the icon above.
Weâ€™ll move to other page, as you can see we have camera view and translation box. Lets go one by one.
This box will require permission to use your camera. In this box you can translate sign language by moving your camera into someone\'s hand.
The translation result from your camera will be place in here. We have two button in the bottom of the box
Back Button, this button will take you to the home page.
Reload Button, use it if you want to re-translate the translation. It will erase the translation on the translation box

string.name: steps
string.br: 1. on the top line, the application will detect the letters in realtime
2. wait until the letters that are detected doesn\'t change
3. press the checklist button to store letters

resources.string: Accept Button, click this button if the word appears in the translation box does not change repeteadly
